mapper.sql: boxId, name, dime, pla, plan, phy,dxf, description, classId, detail1, detail2, detail3, wmin, hmin, lmin, wmax, hmax, lmax, unit, createby, createtime
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.name as className,c.`name` as detail1Name,d.`name` as detail2Name,e.`name`as detail3Name from t_box_type a left JOIN t_box_classification b on a.classId=b.id left JOIN t_box_classification c on a.detail1=c.id left JOIN t_box_classification d on a.detail2=d.id left JOIN t_box_classification e on a.detail3=e.id
mapper.insert: insert into t_box_type (boxId, name, dime, pla, plan, phy, dxf,description, classId, detail1, detail2, detail3, wmin, hmin, lmin, wmax, hmax, lmax, unit, createby, createtime ) values (#{boxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pla,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dxf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wmin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hmin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lmin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{wmax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hmax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lmax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update t_box_type
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pla = #{pla,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
